India is a Secular nation, and we cannot let down minorities in our nation. As a concerned citizen of India, my conscious doesn't allow me to remain silent and be a spectator of this destruction of our nation. And if infact the government has done this to address a refugee crisis as Amit Shah claims, then why miss out Tamil Hindus from Sri Lanka, Buddhists from Tibet, Christians from Bhutan and Gorkas from Nepal? Why single out only Muslims? Make no mistake, CAB expresses the heart and soul of the COMMUNAL AGENDA of the Hindutva rightwing, and seeks to reconstitute the republic into a theocracy. It's time we do something... We need to build a large consense of the public across political party lines to save this nation now. We need to make this as a Mass Peoples Movement beyond any political ideology or party and bring this Govt. down. This is about India... This is about this Nation. We cannot let this Govt. destroy the Idea of India and the value for which India stood for from its Independence. We need to fight for this Nation. Let's do our part. We need to take this fight to the Govt. This cannot be allowed to happen. We need to make this a national movement now. We cannot let this Govt. to destroy this nation.
